title: NArabizi Treebank (LAW 2023)
slice_notes: Universal Dependencies treebank for NArabizi (Algerian Arabizi/code-switched Arabic-French). Contains offensive language annotations. Sourced from newspaper forums and song lyrics.
pii_risk: Low - Contains user-generated content but anonymized
processing_notes: Parsed from CoNLL-U format with offensive classifications. Label mapping: 1->Toxic, 0->Neutral. Preserved train/dev/test splits.
